DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, randomized, single-center study to evaluate the ability of the device to collect good quality blood samples from patients with peripheral IV access over the length of their stay.
DOC.brief_title: Multi-Day Evaluation of the TIVA Device
DOC.criteria: Patient will be admitted to the BWH unit 15 for postsurgical care Patient is at least 18 years old Patient is willing and physically / cognitively able to sign a written consent form Patient is willing and able to complete study questionnaires Patient is NOT a prisoner Active hemodialysis Hemolytic disorders (e.g., sickle cell disease) Pregnancy
